ing: 2 HONEY MAID Honey Grahams, broken in half
des: "Grilled pineapple, white chocolate and a sprinkle of coconut make this s'more a s'more-lover's summer dream."
ins: Top each of 2 cracker halves with half the white chocolate. Heat grill. Grill pineapple slice until warm and surface is golden brown. Cut in half. Place half onto each s'more. Top with marshmallows, coconut and remaining cracker. Gently press. Serve immediately.
